content: Users of forward-looking statements are encouraged to review the company's filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, including the most recent annual report on Form 10-K, quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, current reports on Form 8-K, and all other reports filed with the SEC as required by federal securities laws for a description of all other significant risk factors that may affect the company's business, financial conditions, cash flows and results of operations. Turning to our direct-to-consumer business, sales increased 60% in the quarter, led by results in EMEA, where sales increased over 150%, primarily reflecting last year's COVID-related store closures and operating restrictions.
